info.title: Superplane Organizations API
info.description: API for managing organizations in the Superplane service

get.description: Returns a list of all blueprints

post.description: Creates a new blueprint

get.description: Returns a blueprint
Returns a list of all canvases

post.description: Creates a new canvas with the given name and organization ID

get.description: Returns a list of alerts for the specified canvas (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Acknowledge the specified alert (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of all connection groups for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.summary: Create a new canvas connection group
post.description: Creates a new canvas connection group

get.description: Returns the details of a specific connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

delete.description: Deletes the specified connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of field sets for the specified connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)
Returns a list of all event sources for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Creates a new event source for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

delete.description: Deletes the specified event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

post.summary: Reset the key for an event source
post.description: Resets the key used to receive events from the specified event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of events with optional filtering by source type and source ID

post.description: Creates a new event for the specified canvas (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of events that were rejected by a particular component
Returns a list of all stages for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Creates a new stage for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific stage

delete.description: Deletes the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of events for the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Approves the specified stage event (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)
Discards the specified stage event (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of all executions for the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Cancel the specified stage execution (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

post.summary: Add a user to a canvas
post.description: Add a user to a canvas

delete.summary: Remove a user from a canvas
delete.description: Remove a user from a canvas
Deletes the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific canvas
Returns a list of all components
Returns a component by its name
Returns available actions for a component
Returns a list of groups within a domain

post.description: Creates a new group within a domain with a specific role

get.description: Returns details of a specific group within a domain

delete.description: Deletes an existing group within a domain

put.description: Updates an existing group within a domain

get.description: Returns users that belong to a specific group within a domain

post.description: Adds a user to a group within a domain

patch.description: Removes a user from a group within a domain

get.description: List integrations

post.description: Creates a new canvas integration

get.description: Describe an integration
Returns the currently authenticated user

post.description: Regenerates the currently authencated user's API token

get.description: Returns the details of a specific organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

delete.description: Deletes the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns pending invitations for an organization

post.description: Invites a user to join an organization by email

delete.summary: Remove a user from an organization
delete.description: Removes a user from an organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns available roles for a specific domain type with their permissions and inheritance

post.description: Creates a new custom role with specified permissions

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific role including permissions and inheritance

put.description: Updates an existing custom role with new permissions

post.description: Assigns a role to a user within a domain

get.description: Returns the list of secrets

post.description: Creates a new secret

get.description: Returns the details of a specific secret
Returns all users that have roles within a domain
Returns all permissions a user has within a specific domain
Returns the roles a user has within a specific domain
Returns a list of all workflows

post.description: Creates a new workflow

get.description: Returns a workflow by ID
Returns a list of initial events that triggered executions in a workflow
Returns a list of all node executions triggered by a specific initial event

post.description: Invokes a custom action on a workflow node execution

post.summary: List child executions for an execution
post.description: List child executions for an execution

get.description: Returns a list of executions for a specific workflow node

minute.title: 0-59, minute of the hour to trigger

SecretLocal.description: Local secrets are stored and managed by SuperPlane itself.

metadata.title: No spec needed for Canvas as per the YAML example

SuperplaneFilterOperator.title:
Filters can be combined in two ways:
  - FILTER_OPERATOR_AND: all filters must be true (default)
  - FILTER_OPERATOR_OR: at least one filter must be true

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
